name: chriszuber-portfolio
description: A responsive, progressive about / portfolio & blog page built using Jekyll

scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.build: npm run build:icons && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:site: npm run build:all && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.postinstall: npm run git:submodules && npm run build
scripts.serve:production: npm run build && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll serve

author: Chris Zuber <chris@chriszuber.com>
